name: Potions in Motion
description:
It's a big day for selling potions at the local fair. Watch out for potion orders coming in and add the right ingredients to the cauldron. Use your mouse to grab and throw potions, fill out enough orders correctly and try to not cause too much chaos!

If you don't have time to download and play, please watch the full gameplay video on this page and review from that :) 

How to play:

Mix potions together to match the requests at the top

  • Pick up 2 potions (with mouse buttons)
  • Mix them in the Cauldron (by clicking on it)
  • Throw the bottles away (with mouse buttons)

Known bug: Sometimes the game does not start past the first voice over, the wizard just looks through the window.
To fix: Just restart the game by quitting and relaunching
